title: Eagle-eyed Emmerdale viewers distracted by Tracy's mucky fake tan fail
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Eagle-eyed viewers were distracted by Tracy Metcalfe's fake tan fail on tonight's Emmerdale.

Devastated Tracy called an ambulance after Kerry Wyatt was left fighting for her life following their scuffle in the garden.

When Vanessa Woodfield and Charity Dingle watched lifeless Kerry being taken to hospital they questioned Tracy about the 'accident'.

Visibly shaken Tracy revealed to her sister that Kerry had 'killed' their dad Frank - but some viewers were not paying attention.

They had more of an interest in the mess on the collar of Tracy's white jumper during the tense scene.

(Image: itv)

(Image: itv)

Some Emmerdale fans took to Twitter after spotting either fake tan or make-up on her jumper.

One viewer said: "Most of Tracy's orange face make up is on the neck of her white jumper... far too much plastered on"

"Makeup or tan mark all around Tracy's neck of her jumper," added another.

A third agreed: "There is so much make up on the neck of Tracys top"

"Tracy has a lot of tan going on," said a fourth.

(Image: itv)

(Image: itv)

Tracy admitted she didn't know where to start while trying to explain why Kerry was unconscious.

When Vanessa asked what had happened between the pair, distressed Tracy could barely speak, but eventually came clean.

"She's been living under this roof. Supporting me. And all the time...she killed our dad," confessed Tracy.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Vanessa claimed she could not go around throwing more accusations, having wrongly pointed the finger at Dawn before, but Tracy was adamant she had got the truth.

Revealing how Kerry came to be fighting for her life, Tracy said: "Cause I grabbed her, she just...sort of tripped over. Banged her head. It's no more than she deserved. I'm not apologising for it."

Later on, Tracy went to the hospital, but furious Amy screamed at her to leave.

(Image: itv)

(Image: itv)

Angry Emmerdale viewers slammed everyone for making Tracy out to be the bad guy.

Taking to Twitter, one viewer said: "Tracy is not the villain here!!!! Come on!"

"So how come they're doubting Tracy? She's your sister ffs, she's not gonna lie about something like this!

A third said: "Shut up Vanessa & try actually listening to Tracy for once

*Emmerdale airs weeknights on ITV at 7pm with an extra episode on Thursdays at 8pm
description: Tracy Metcalfe came clean to sister Vanessa about Kerry's 'accident' - but Emmerdale viewers spotted the mess on her white jumper
